name: Triple Fantasy
description:
Fight your way through a magical adventure using a card-based battle system.
#CardBattle #RPG #Strategy #Fantasy #Pixel

When imagination becomes your reality.
• Take on the role as the most powerful sorcerer in the world. Only you can save them!
• Complete quests, explore lands, and fight against countless enemy types and monsters.

Create the perfect card combinations to destroy your enemies!
• Set traps, use poison, throw fire, absorb damage- there are hundreds of different skills to utilize!
• Collect Runes, Summon Heroes, Upgrade Skills, and Master the Elements.

Pixel Animation
• Hundreds of pixel characters and heroes to choose from.
• A wide range of unique "common/rare/hero/legend" cards to build the perfect deck.
• Cute isn't everything, each card has a different job and class!

Easy to Play
• Wherever you are, you can start a battle and pause it to finish later.
• Free to play!
• Awesome graphics with color blind mode.

A world of endless adventures!
• Kingdom - Save the threatened kingdom. Feel like a hero!
• Goblin Mines - Brain Power and Strategic Farming!
• Arena - Everyone is equal in the Arena... Unpredictable battles with random cards!
• Red Mountains - A chance to obtain a powerful monster card!
• Mad Assistant's Lab - A variety of monsters created by crazy scientists!


※ In-App Purchase Options Available.
